abstract: Suriname's Pres Desi Bouterse, former military leader convicted in 1999 in the Netherlands of drug trafficking, seems headed for second term after parliamentary election.
lead_paragraph: President Desi Bouterse, a former military leader convicted in 1999 in the Netherlands of drug trafficking, appeared to be on course for a second term in Suriname.

headline.main: Suriname: Despite Checkered Past, President Seems Set for New Term
headline.print_headline: The Americans; Suriname: Despite Checkered Past, President Seems Set for New Term

snippet: President Desi Bouterse, a former military leader convicted in 1999 in the Netherlands of drug trafficking, appeared to be on course for a second term in Suriname.
